title: Microservices Social Platform
description: A scalable social media app built with microservices architecture. Separate services for user management, posts, and notifications, integrated with a CI/CD pipeline.

title: Full Stack E-commerce Platform

focusedOn: MERN Stack, Authentication, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI

title: Full Stack Web Solutions
